short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A live-viewer for services that expose metrics in the Prometheus-format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A live Prometheus-endpoints monitor visualizer. If you are a developer running software locally or if you are an SRE investigating production hiccups, you sometime want to look at how one metric evolves in a specific job.
